readable.title: 3546891929_f31a99cd0d
readable.content: A man in a bicycle helmet is talking on a cellphone with other people behind him . A man in a helmet holding a cellphone . A man in a plaid shirt with a red and black bike helmet on his cellphone . A man wearing a red bicycle helmet talking on a cellphone with other people in the background . A man with a bicycle helmet on is using a cellphone in the midst of a crowd .
